channel.title: Website of Alexei Gazca
channel.description: Recent content on Website of Alexei Gazca

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello! I am Alexei Gazca (aka Pablo Alexei Gazca Orozco), currently a postdoctoral researcher at the Mathematical Institute at Charles University in Prague, in the group of Josef Málek.

item.title: Academic History
item.description:
since 2020 Postdoctoral researcher, Chair in Applied Analysis, FAU Erlangen-Nürnberg, Germany (in the group of Prof. Enrique Zuazua).

This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Submitted (in review) P. A. Gazca-Orozco, and V. Patel. Weak-strong uniqueness for heat conducting non-Newtonian incompressible fluids 2021.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: In the academic year 2019-2020 I worked as a Stipendiary Lecturer in Mathematics at Wadham College, University of Oxford, where I delivered tutorials for several undergraduate courses:
